00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "ROdometryDataWithSpeed"
00022 
00023 #include "rodometrydatawithspeed.h"
00024 #include <iomanip>
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00027 
00028 RDK2_FACTORY(ROdometryDataWithSpeed);
00029 
00030 string ROdometryDataWithSpeed::getLogLine() const
00031 {
00032     ostringstream oss;
00033     oss << setprecision(6) << logtag << " ";
00034     oss << speed << " " << jog << " ";
00035     oss << odometryPose.x << " " << odometryPose.y << " " << odometryPose.theta << " ";
00036     oss << estimatedPose.x << " " << estimatedPose.y << " " << estimatedPose.theta << " ";
00037     oss << timestamp.getMsFromMidnight() << " "
00038         << ipc_hostname << " " << ipc_timestamp.getMsFromMidnight();
00039     return oss.str();
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool ROdometryDataWithSpeed::loadFromLogLine(cstr line)
00043 {
00044     istringstream iss(line);
00045     string name;
00046     iss >> name;
00047     if (name != logtag)
00048     {
00049         RDK_ERROR_STREAM("The first token in the line must be" << logtag);
00050         return false;
00051     }
00052     iss >> speed >> jog;
00053     iss >> odometryPose.x >> odometryPose.y >> odometryPose.theta;
00054     iss >> estimatedPose.x >> estimatedPose.y >> estimatedPose.theta;
00055     unsigned long a;
00056     iss >> a;
00057     timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00058     iss >> ipc_hostname;
00059     iss >> a;
00060     ipc_timestamp.setMsFromMidnight(a);
00061     return true;
00062 }
